com.ociweb.box
Interface BOXDOMEncoder

All Known Implementing Classes:
BOXDOMEncoderImpl
public interface BOXDOMEncoder

Encodes Binary Optimized XML (BOX) from a DOM Document. This is more compact and can be parsed faster than standard XML.

Author:
R. Mark Volkmann, Object Computing, Inc.

Method Summary
 void encode(org.w3c.dom.Document doc, java.io.OutputStream os, boolean useASCII, boolean trimWhitespace)
          Encodes a Document to a given OutputStream.
 

Method Detail

encode

public void encode(org.w3c.dom.Document doc,
                   java.io.OutputStream os,
                   boolean useASCII,
                   boolean trimWhitespace)
            throws java.io.IOException
Encodes a Document to a given OutputStream.
Parameters:
doc - the Document to be encoded
os - the OutputStream
useASCII - true to use ASCII; false to use UTF-8
trimWhitespace - true to trim whitespace in attribute and text values; false otherwise
